name: Turbo Fuse 130 M VI, USP Class VI
description: Turbo Fuse 130 M VI, USP Class VI medical devices advanced formula is designed to polymerize instantly by absorbing surface moisture. The product's performance has been tested with a variety of materials, and is recommended for a multitude of applications. The fast curing qualities make it especially desirable in high speed industrial production. Turbo Fuse Medical devices is ideal for use in applications that require good "wicking" characteristics and/or in close fitting applications approved for use on Medical Devices.
